subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 31 points, Allen Iverson added 23 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the New Orleans Hornets’ final game in their temporary home with a 107-105 victory last night.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 31 points, Allen Iverson added 23 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the New Orleans Hornets’ final game in their temporary home with a 107-105 victory last night.
